title: Saudi blogger Raif Badawi on shortlist for Sakharov Prize (ECR - European Conservatives and Reformists´ ...
text: ( Source : ECR - European Conservatives and Reformists´ Group ) Raif Badawi , a Saudi Arabian blogger sentenced to 1, 000 lashes for his publications on the weblog ' Free Saudi Liberals ', has been nominated for the 2015 Sakharov Prize . Through
